successes.title: Unsung Story: Tale of the Guardians
successes.description: A rich, diverse Tactical RPG, envisioned by the master of the genre Yasumi Matsuno, Playdek, and you, the fans!

Pledges.description: Help keep us awake and focused! Backers at this level will receive a forum badge for the Playdek Forums and acknowledgement on our special "Kickstarter Thank You" page on our website when our new website launches later this year.
Receive the $3 rewards plus a digital copy of Unsung Story: Tale of the Guardians when it releases and a special Unsung Story Desktop Wallpaper.
Receive the $3 rewards plus a digital copy of Unsung Story: Tale of the Guardians when it releases and a special Unsung Story Desktop Wallpaper.
Receive the $30 rewards plus a digital Unsung Story poster, a digital copy of the soundtrack, and a digital copy of the strategy guide for the tactical game.

Receive the $50 rewards plus a digital art book, beta access to the game when it is ready, and your choice of one of the following special Kickstarter Edition classes (each comes with a special skin and a special weapon with bonus stats): War Mage, Ballast Knight, Polearm Knight, or Aerolest (more details about the classes in the Game Play Overview section).

Receive the $80 rewards plus a digital copy of the Unsung Story Card Game when it is released later this year along with 5 additional cards to add to your game, a physical Unsung Story poster, and an Unsung Story USB drive.

Receive the $50 rewards plus your name in the game credits as a "Kickstarter Producer", printed Strategy Guide, a physical Unsung Story poster, Unsung Story USB, a digital art book, beta access to the game when it is ready, and an additional digital copy of Unsung Story to give to a friend.
